Text To Speech
Create a tag for your dog! Example: If your dog runs away, whoever finds it could touch the tag and call the owner.
This is an editable tag. Only you can edit it, but anyone who touches the tag will enjoy the experience.
Event will be saved on the device.
By deleting SmartTag NT3 from the device, the tag will be reset and any events will be deleted.
If someone else connects to this tag and creates an event, you will no longer be the event administrator.
